org.spongepowered.api.network

Interface ChannelBinding.RawDataChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelBinding
    Enclosing interface:
    ChannelBinding

    public static interface ChannelBinding.RawDataChannel
extends ChannelBinding
    Represents a channel that sends and receives raw data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.network.ChannelBinding

        ChannelBinding.IndexedMessageChannel, ChannelBinding.RawDataChannel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(Platform.Type side, RawDataListener listener)
      Adds a listener to this channel that is invoked every time data is sent to it on the given side.
      void addListener(RawDataListener listener)
      Adds a listener to this channel that is invoked every time data is sent to it on either side.
      void removeListener(RawDataListener listener)
      Removes the listener from handling data.
      void sendTo(Player player, Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
      Sends the raw payload to the player across this channel.
      void sendToAll(Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
      Sends the raw payload to all players on the server.
      void sendToServer(Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
      Sends the raw payload to the server.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.network.ChannelBinding

        getName, getOwner, getRegistrar

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(RawDataListener listener)
        Adds a listener to this channel that is invoked every time data is sent to it on either side.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener

      • addListener

        void addListener(Platform.Type side,
                 RawDataListener listener)
        Adds a listener to this channel that is invoked every time data is sent to it on the given side.
        Parameters:
        side - The side to listen to data on
        listener - The listener

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(RawDataListener listener)
        Removes the listener from handling data.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener

      • sendTo

        void sendTo(Player player,
            Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
        Sends the raw payload to the player across this channel. The data may not be sent if the player doesn't have a registered handler.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send the message to
        payload - A consumer to write the data to

      • sendToServer

        void sendToServer(Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
        Sends the raw payload to the server. The data may not be sent if there is no registered handler. This must be called from the client side.
        Parameters:
        payload - A consumer to write the data to

      • sendToAll

        void sendToAll(Consumer<ChannelBuf> payload)
        Sends the raw payload to all players on the server.
        Parameters:
        payload - A consumer to write the data to
